The Challenge Network Society
WAVE 6 REUNION! - CAT LAUNCH & STAFF ASSESSORS
{!Contact.FirstName}
How would you improve your community with £300?
This is an opportunity for the grads of wave 6 to get together and have some fun, think of great ways to improve our communities, eat some pizza and help us choose next years mentors!
we will be forming an 'action team' who will come up with a great idea to improve their communities and apply to the O2 think big for £300 funding. We are also needing graduates to help us assess mentors and team leaders to work with us in the summer. This is a great chance to get everone together, have a laugh and do something positive - EVERYBODY WINS!!
We'd love to know if you are coming. Please RSVP by clicking on this link and logging in to your TCS profile: http://www.thechallengesociety.org/login.php?reason=1&continue=%2Findex.php%3F
Username: {!Contact.Email} Password: {!Contact.Login_Password__c}
Looking forward to seeing you!
Rob Whiteside robert.whiteside@the-challenge.org 07785 623 392
Where: The Challenge Head Office 75 Westminster Bridge Road London SE1 7HS
When: Saturday 10th March 2012
13:00 - 15:00 (17:00)
